content.p: Museum and Art Gallery (of Central Bank of Malaysia) Internship Description: Museum and Art Gallery (of Central Bank of Malaysia) is a central bank museum of international stature that supports the national development of Malaysia. We collect, preserve, research, chronicle and exhibit objects and knowledge representing the country’s financial, economic, artistic and natural heritage. The Museum’s six galleries - Art, Economics, Islamic Finance, Numismatics, Children’s and Central Bank of Malaysia - as well as its supporting departments, are committed to meaningful engagement with people from all walks of life. Through innovative exhibitions, scholarly projects and outreach activities, we seek to elevate financial literacy and appreciation of Malaysia’s cultural distinctiveness. If you are interested in our creative mode of public service, join us today as an intern. Internship assignments: Academic majors: Personal attributes: Application materials: Send all application materials to: Internship Programme Museum and Art Gallery (of Central Bank of Malaysia) Sasana Kijang Building 2 Jalan Dato’ Onn 50480 Kuala Lumpur Application is accepted throughout the year. Only shortlisted candidates will be notified. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
